analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS momentum pushed the score to 41, indicating a Neutral regime. While rising DXY (Dollar strength) pressures liquidity, a softening VIX (Fear) at 17.47 suggests market stabilization. Despite low Crypto sentiment (5), price recovery hints at a potential floor. Maintain a neutral stance and monitor the flat momentum for direction.

reports.EN: GMS momentum pushed the score to 41, indicating a Neutral regime. While rising DXY (Dollar strength) pressures liquidity, a softening VIX (Fear) at 17.47 suggests market stabilization. Despite low Crypto sentiment (5), price recovery hints at a potential floor. Maintain a neutral stance and monitor the flat momentum for direction.

reports.ID: Momentum GMS mendorong skor ke 41, menjaga pasar dalam rezim Netral. DXY (kekuatan Dolar) menekan likuiditas, namun VIX (ketakutan) yang melunak di 17,47 menunjukkan stabilisasi. Sentimen Kripto berada di level 5, namun pemulihan harga mengisyaratkan dasar pasar. Pertahankan sikap netral dan pantau momentum datar untuk arah selanjutnya.
